title: Extensible OAuth providers (config + plugin)
description:
Allow adding 3rd party OAuth providers via:
1. Config: Edit config.toml with id, name, client_id, auth_url, token_url, scopes, api_type
2. Plugin: Drop-in file with pre-configured OAuth flow (for non-technical users)

Core provides PKCE, callback server, storage. Config/plugin provides endpoints.
Built-in (ChatGPT, Gemini) stay hardcoded. This is for 3rd party extensibility.
